location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from John MacLeod, Resident in the Persian Gulf, to Major Henry Willock, in Charge of His Britannic Majesty's Mission, Tabriz

mods.abstract: The letter informs Willock that three sergeants and one corporal of HM 20th Regiment of Foot have arrived at Bushere [Bushire] from Bombay en route to Tabriz to relieve the men of His Majesty's 65th Regiment. MacLeod informs him that they will march tomorrow and he has advanced them money which he has sent to Captain Hart.
